mapper.select: SELECT A.ID, A.BLOS_TYPE_NAME || ' [' || COUNT(B.ID) || '篇]' AS ACTNAME FROM SYS_BLOS_TYPE A LEFT OUTER JOIN SYS_ACTIVITY B ON A.ID = B.ACT_TYPE AND B.DEL_FLAG = '0' WHERE A.DEL_FLAG = '0' AND A.PSN_ID = #{mineBlos.psnId} GROUP BY A.BLOS_TYPE_NAME,A.ID ORDER BY COUNT(B.ID) DESC

SELECT SUBSTR(a.CREATE_DATE, 1, 10) AS dicName, a.ACT_TITLE as dicValue, b.BLOS_TYPE_NAME as value, c.ID as key FROM SYS_ACTIVITY a LEFT JOIN SYS_BLOS_TYPE b ON b.ID = a.ACT_TYPE LEFT JOIN SYS_MINE_ACTIVITY c ON c.ACT_ID = a.ID WHERE a.CREATE_ID = '1' AND a.DEL_FLAG = '0' ORDER BY a.CREATE_DATE DESC
mapper.update: update SYS_ACTIVITY set DEL_FLAG = 1 where ID = #{ids}
update SYS_MINE_ACTIVITY set DEL_FLAG = 1 where ACT_ID = #{ids}
mapper.select: SELECT ma.*, sa.ACT_TYPE FROM SYS_MINE_ACTIVITY ma LEFT JOIN SYS_ACTIVITY sa ON sa.ID = ma.ACT_ID WHERE ma.ACT_ID = #{mineBlos.actId} AND sa.CREATE_ID = #{mineBlos.psnId}
